title: Cricket Score Prediction System
description: Optimized XGBoost for regression tasks on noisy, high-dimensional datasets and developed advanced features like current score, wickets, run rate, and last 5 overs' runs to drive a real-time cricket score prediction model

title: Football Tracking and Assignment System
description: Used YOLO for real-time detection of players, referees, and the ball, applying proximity-based assignment for ball possession, visualized objects with dynamic color coding and shapes, and used linear interpolation to maintain consistent tracking

title: EMG Acquisition Circuit
description: Collaboratively designed and implemented an electromyography system for the McMaster Engineering Design Team, utilizing advanced circuit design and filtering techniques to accurately capture and amplify muscle activity

title: Functional Digital Keyboard
description: Developed a functional lock system on a microcontroller that switched an indicator light from D1 to D2 upon entering the correct key combination, while maintaining D1 active and D2 inactive for incorrect inputs

title: Live Motion Capture Biomechanics Software
description: Developed a computer vision software to analyze a real-time video input for landmark detection, hand tracking, and identification of body angles

title: 3D Spatial Viewing
description: An embedded system architecture project made to collect and reconstruct spatial dimensions to develop a 3D digital model rendering of any room or hallway

title: Text to Braille Converter
description: This was a school-based project made for the visually impaired so that any external image can be taken by the device and instantaneously turn the image into braille lettering
